website_summaries.verdict: A great value for the price, with plenty of replacement tips, good accuracy and a comfortable grip.
pros: Nicely weighted with a good feel in the hand
2 sizes of stylus tips, plus replacements, along with screen cleaning cloth
Tips are easy to swap out
Fine tip is accurate and precise
Compatible with iOS and Android screens
cons: Top part of tip can wear and break off after several hours of use
May not work well on screen protectors
Screen may pick up edge of the disc, marring artwork

customer_reviews.title: Expectacular. These are premium pens.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I bought these pens to be able to write in the google Keyboard. They're awesome, very accurate. They are easy to hold and they feel nice. They feel very Premium, well built and comfortable. Now I can do my summer assignments without a computer. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Paula F.

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product when it works but there were many times where it wouldn’t work and I would have to struggle to make it work. It is honestly a waste of money since I ended up buying the surface pen and it works so much better. Do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Update.  Third pen like tis which falls apart.  The pen just falls into 3 pieces.  a clear design flaw.  dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months the pen separated into 2 pieces. I made Meko aware of the problem. Within a week I had a new pen. No questions asked. The new pen seems to be indestructible. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: I am utterly amazed at how the review is so good
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this pen. I never used a stylus with a disc end, so I was very curious. Turns out the disc is the most annoying part.... The 'flip' when the disc falls flat against the screen gives an unintended extra drawing which bothers me so much. I'd say using the other end felt even better...
customer_reviews.author: Jeesoo P.

customer_reviews.title: Only one tip actually works and not for long
customer_reviews.text: The precision tip doesn’t work at all because the disc is connected via a tiny rubber piece that is very weak. You can’t write at all. The other end wears out and breaks like a cheap stylus within a couple of months. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Newton

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, its great for when i take notes on files and things like that. Cant lean my hands on the screen while writing but thats okay. Feels heavy and durable. Very sleek design. I use it for school on my acer spin
customer_reviews.author: Akary D.

customer_reviews.title: Useless disc tip - times 6!!
customer_reviews.text: I love using the fiber tip - much better than those cheap rubber tips I had been wearing out overnight! I do a lot of coloring/drawing, so I ordered this specifically for the “precision” disc tip. Unfortunately, not a single tip out of the 6 included give me the precision or ability to make fine lines. NOTHING like the “able to take notes” use that I read about in the reviews. Absolutely disappointed with the disc tip. Utterly useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Betty aka Boop

customer_reviews.title: I was very impressed with the quality of these pens ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of these pens. I was worried after reading some reviews that they may not work on my IPad with a screen protector, but I have no problem at all and I do not have to press hard for the pen part to work through the glass protector. The wire end, one does have to press harder than the pen side, but it didn't matter if the protector was on or off of the IPad.
customer_reviews.author: PJ B.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Useless, contacted company they told me to ship them ...
customer_reviews.text: Useless, contacted company they told me to ship them back (at my expense) and then said me new ones. It was going to cost 50% of the cost of the product to ship them. So I said forget it. But don't waste your money. Especially because if you get ones that don't work the company is no help
customer_reviews.author: Zaza

customer_reviews.title: Basically, a LIE, since this laptop pencil is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Very simple my friends, the presentation is a lie because since it looks so nice you may think it is good for something, but not, just pure junk. There should be several tips for different thickness and be able to draw. These tips are wide and only good to touch the screen, but nothing more: The tip is too thick! It is so worthless, that I put them in the garbage can. Now days, I have discovered many items that are junk: People design things and produce them without trial and even worth, sometimes produce very dangerous items. We live in a crazy world.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but HATE it.
customer_reviews.text: This pen writes amazing, BUT it scratched my iPad so badly!!! So mad! I cleaned my screen before I started writing, and this is what happened. It is an amazing pen, BUT DONT PUT IT ON YOUR ACTUAL SCREEN!!! Have a protective screen!!!! You can see where I wrote last night with it. So upset. :( also, glad it came with more heads, because the first one was messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Best Pen Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your $100 dollars on the apple pen. I looked at the apple pen for my iPad Pro which I just got. But $100 for a pen is ridiculous when you pay so much for the iPad anyway. I hate Apple's Greed. I decided to look around and found this pen which comes with many tips and two pens. It is solid and works great. Let's face the facts there are not many applications yet to this point that require a pen. So for the average to professional user spending $15.00 for 2 pens is no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: ronnie dodge

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance at a Bargain Price
customer_reviews.text: A couple of months ago I bought an Adonis stylus from Amazon. It was just okay. Was not satisfied, so looked again and discovered this gem. It is fantastic! And a real bargain too. Under $15 for two complete units, each with 3 replacement points...one each selector tip and two each writing points. The stylus has the right weight and size to just feel great. Then the writing or drawing with the fine point is xcellent. I am actually able to take notes on my iPad app Flexcil that actually looks like my handwriting. I am impressed! I strongly recommend this stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Bob

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond impressed. I have been struggling to see what is so wonderful about the Apple Pencil, you know, the $100 one. I would take these in a heartbeat. I just bought 3 sets and will buy more..mostly because I lose everything! This is not a paid endorsement, Frankly, that makes me really angry, we have gone on the reviews of other customers for many years and now, knowing that people get paid to write 5 star reviews makes us leary of everything. These pens are awesome, and for the price, 2 pens and 8 tips , can’t beat that....they are much more precise than the Apple pencil too.
customer_reviews.author: TKT

customer_reviews.title: Well-made stylus.
customer_reviews.text: The MEKO stylus housed in vibrant color, all metal casing. Screw tips on either end, and they are secure. Balanced grip. Four discs, two mesh tips in addition to those already set on both stylus ends. Styluses are packaged in black presentation box with black velvet interior, business card and instructions, in addition to a packaged satin wipe cloth. Would make a thoughtful inexpensive office gift. Tips glide with barely any noticeable drag. This particular MEKO model was top-rated along with costly brands by many consumer magazines. Pleased with purchase for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Scotspiration™

customer_reviews.title: Feels good in your hand
customer_reviews.text: This stylus has some substance. The rounded end works just as well as the rubber tipped ones if not better. The other end, the high precision one is stupendous. If someone uses a touch screen to draw on, I'm sure this would be an asset. I love that it came with replacement ends should the one's on the pen fail. Plus there's a second pen included with it's own spare parts. This would be a great gift for someone on your gift list that would be hard to buy for or if you needed a non-committal type gift (like a friend, brother/sister -in law, boss, etc). But before you buy one for someone else, get this for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: R. Gault

customer_reviews.title: Amazing must have stylus!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my kindergarten daughter who’s doing virtual learning this year, figured she needed to learn to hold a pencil and write than to keep using her finger, which thankfully this is working amazingly!! It has two different tips and even has spares when one gets broken, let’s not forget it comes with two styluses in case you lose one, and even has an amazing case that holds them both with the extra tips!! I highly recommend this!! I’m tempted to grab all my kids one because let’s face it, no telling when this virtual learning will end!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Responsive
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stylus. I had never owned one before so I did not know what to expect. I use it mainly to edit pictures and it does a great job of that. I don’t think it would be easy to write with this but that’s not what I need it for. It’s prefect that it Cosme ready to use out of the box! No syncing, app to download NOTHING! That’s definetly a plus. I dread getting new stuff because every day the instructions get more and more complicated and less explanatory. Getting two in a box plus replaceable tips is an added bonus. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Stylus pens in the world! Best value for money!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST stylus pens I have ever had! The pack came with 2 pens (double ended!!) As well as some replacement ends when the first batch gets too worn or lost, and a cloth to keep your screen looking nice and clean! Since I had 2 pens and only needed 1, I gave one to my boss to use, he loves his, too! These also work well on my new SMART board, even better than the SMART pens that came with the board! If I ever need another stylus pen, These are the ones I'll get!
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Best stylus I have found.
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my iPhone. I work in construction and can’t always get my gloves off in time to answer a call or don’t want to take them off to text. I like the different ends but use the microfiber end more than the plastic end. My dad loves the plastic end for his iPad. We bought more sets for gifts. Comes in a nice box and the extra tips are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: lilamanda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's not worth it tips are to flimsy and call break off
customer_reviews.author: Da Vinchi

customer_reviews.title: Great for reading and highlighting
customer_reviews.text: I am a graduate student and I have to read a lot of PDFs for research and classes. The pen is really nice on my touch screen laptop for highlighting important things in my research. I also wanted to reduced the fingerprints I was leaving when utilizing touch functions. Would probably work even better for these purposes on a tablet. I don't do anything artistic with them so I can't vouch for their use in that regard. The packaging was really nice and come with many extra of the end tips. The pens feel like good quality. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Rubino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent idea. Excellent build quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent idea. Excellent build quality. Sadly, not recognized as easily as my finger, on the LG V20 phone, with capacitive touch and the screen protector that comes on the phone, which I have no taken off because my finger works fine with it. I'll raise this a star if I ever get a better screen protector and find out that this really works for clicking small objects on the screen, which it has been failing for, lately.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous styli and this is the absolute best. Both the micro tip and mesh tip are accurate. I use the stylus on both my iPhone 11 Promax and iPad Air. I have some arthritis and my right hand cramps after using my thumb or other fingers. This solve the problem. Big advantage is this model does not require charging. Both ends are always available. The cap screws on both ends as well reducing the chance of loss. The price is right. Two stylus and replacement tips for under $25 is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Ballcoach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for remote teaching
customer_reviews.text: Bought the stylus set for on-screen notation while remote-teaching math (drawing shapes, writing fractions, formulas, etc.) during virtual class sessions. The soft end glides easier than some of the cheap styluses I've tried (those tend to catch on the screen's surface, affecting handwriting). The nib end (with the transparent collar/disk) helps the stylus glide smoothly, without obstructing view of the tip. Nice to have two styluses in the kit, with extra replacement nibs and soft tips. Do not have first-hand experience with higher-end graphing tools, but would definitely recommend this set for the remote teaching usecase.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Volkov

customer_reviews.title: On point!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would enable precise writing and coloring and this one wins! I wasn't sure how it would work with the little disc on the tip, but it was perfect. The extra tips are nice to have also. Oh and the presentation in the box is very nice. I'm impressed w/everything about these, especially for the price. I will definitely look into the brand, MEKO, to see what else they make, because I'm sure I'll need it. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for online learners
customer_reviews.text: These were just what my kids needed. With the current situation my kids are using Chromebooks for school. Often assignments involve writing\drawing on the touchscreen. Using fingers was clumsy and sloppy, and rubbery stylus often combined with pens would stick to the screen it not read at all. This stylus has helped end that frustration for them and for us parents. They all also like them for artwork on the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Sometimes I Buy Things

customer_reviews.title: Much better than rubber tipped stylus
customer_reviews.text: I own a business and use a square to process all my charges and debits. Sign in with your finger is great if you're young person and you're used to that but older people need a utensil. This thing is great for signing on a glass screen like an iPad. The rubber tipped Stylus wants to stick to the glass screen as where this fabric tip just Glides over the glass. I would definitely suggest these and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Stylus
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’ 5 @ 290# so needless to say, typing on a regular sized iPhone with my bear mitts can sometimes be a challenge. This stylus has been a God send. It is very well constructed, gives you a choice of tips (depending on your device), doesn’t need charging and it looks nice. Haven’t had a single issue with it since I got it. For all of the texting I do throughout the day, I’m still using the same tip that was on it when it arrived (though it came with extra tips as well). All in all, this is a great stylus and I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a solid, reasonably priced stylus.
customer_reviews.author: One2Thunder

customer_reviews.title: If nibs fall out, you've got a defective one
customer_reviews.text: I was contacted by the company and offered a replacement. The replacements work perfectly. If you need a stylus, please consider buying this one. I have no complaints now. Previously: Nifty idea. Bad execution. My nibs fall out of the pink pen so easily I only have one left. I bought them hoping they would work better than the previous model, but the difference is negligible...and the nibs get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Noña

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stylus. I especially like the small stylus tip ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stylus. I especially like the small stylus tip that opens apps on my ipad 2 air with one try as opposed to others that take two or more taps. It is the only one I've had that can do this. Also it slides across the screen smoothly. The rubber tip styluses generally skip across the screen. I am totally sold on this product. Good job MEKO....
customer_reviews.author: royboy

customer_reviews.title: If Only There Were No Disk
customer_reviews.text: The pen itself is not bad. However, I cannot get over the little disk on the tip. It is so distracting that writing with this pen is just as frustrating as trying to use your finger to write. I think the quality is there for the price (hence 3 stars), but it is simply not a product I am willing to work with. Frankly, I think investing the extra money to get a pen that requires charging for the capacitance feature would be far more optimal and the price difference would be well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get one earlier? These are Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an artist but I love to color and work puzzles. I have found it impossible to do these things without a stylus and have been using the hard rubber one that came with my tablet til it broke. Then I bought these. The difference is night and day! These are very sensitive and glide over the screen like Silk and the flat disk not only works great for notes but let's me get into tiny spaces when coloring. Best of all it works on every electronic touch screen device I have, phones, Android tablets and even my Amazon Fire, that until now has been unresponsive to every stylus I've tried. FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the best choice
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter carefully researched the various stylus models here for our Wacom. The AmazonBasics model is really good but this set from Meko is far more versatile. Lots of choice of sizes to vary an artist’s technique. She loves it. Great box for storage, too.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly works for random laptop
customer_reviews.text: The pen is amazing, I purchased it for a laptop. I was unsure if it would work at all but I needed it for my kids school work. My 6yr old is the one who uses the pen and absolutely loves it. The accuracy of the point is amazing. Having additional changing pieces with two children is a must and is so easy to change. I tried it on multiple devices to make sure and all the same. This was exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Practical & Affordable
customer_reviews.text: These work well on my galaxy s10's screen and on my girlfriends touch screen laptop. *My phone does have a screen protector and it works fine.* I like the weight they have, not too heavy but enough to easily help provide extra pressure when using on any screen. I have found mine most useful for apps like lightroom and photoshop. They seem to be fairly durable. Liked them enough to buy a second pair at any rate. For the price I think it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great for note taking.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I am able to write without any issues. I bought a different one at first that was not for writing, mainly for tapping or scrolling. I didn't know any better at the time. Nonetheless, I bought this one and it is very nice looking. Comes in a little box that I store them in. If you are looking for something to use to take notes with you tablet or laptop, this is what I'd advise.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent packaging
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. They are aluminum and come with plenty of nibs so you dont have to worry about running out soon or damaging the ones you are using. The packaging was very nice and was what I would expect from products 5x the price point. The stylus is accurate, works well for drawing and swiping, and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Riley McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Im not a tablet pen aficionado in any way. Other than the pens that came with certain phones and tablets i havent really used any except those round nubby ones that some companys would give away as a tablet pen/writing combo. I wasnt too sure about the whole clear disc portion at first but man did it make note taking and sketching much easier. If you want to try a sketching style pen but either unsure or not willing to spend the 50 plus dollars for a bluetooth pen then give this one a try its worth the price especially as a starter pen or even a sturdy backup to a more expensive one
customer_reviews.author: Allen R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not a substitute for an Apple Pencil
customer_reviews.text: The description kind of dances around what these styli do and don’t do. We wanted these for ProPresenter’s “Telestrator” function, and they do just okay. They are NOT going to give you Wacom or Apple Pencil-like control. The clear disc allows you to better see where the stylus is pointing, but it’s just not super-precise. They work, but don’t expect miracles.
customer_reviews.author: Church Sound Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great for seniors, or anyone, to text with ease!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 81-year-old mother who was having difficulty hitting the letters on her iPhone. She kept saying she needed a larger phone, but no longer wants that inconvenience. I use them myself when my fingers are cold since the conductivity is better than my fingertips. They do not look cheap and seem as if they will withstand the test of time. The replacement tips they come with make this package a great bargain for the quality your receive. I bought the 2-pack and my mother loves the gold and black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with drawing software
customer_reviews.text: This stylus is really well made, nicely weighted, and comes with a ton of replacement tips, but it's not any more useful than your finger in that it doesn't register in drawing software (Photoshop) as a pen that can be used for drawing. It also didn't work as a writing tool in the NYT crosswords app. So basically it's a really nicely-built replacement for what you can do without any stylus at all. For me it was a waste, but others might find it useful.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Stylus
customer_reviews.text: It came in a fun fancy looking box. I use the felt tip because the plastic disk ended up scratching my phone case screen. I don't know whether or not it would scratch the actual phone screen because I always have a case on mine and I'm not about to test it. After using the felt tip, I've had no problems. It's a bit heavier than my other mini stylus, but I actually prefer the weight. It feels sturdy. I use them to play some phone games where it would be hard to see the screen with my finger in the way.
customer_reviews.author: flickagal07

customer_reviews.title: Great stylus!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife since she was wanting a stylus so she could write on her iPad mini and her iPhone 7 plus. She loves it. The precision tip allows her to write normally, and it has the typical fat tip on the other end for use instead of your finger when operating the device. The stylus seems to be made very well using high quality metal. This stylus does have some weight to it, so if you want something light weight that might be an issue for you. This one feels like a high quality metal cased pen in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Two styluses with four tips each. Very precise, works on most touch screens. I have used it on my phone (LG), my tablet (Zenpad 3s) and my laptop (Dell 2-in-1). Regardless of the type of tip you need, you have it available to you. I love this so much that when I misplaced my 1st set, I purchased another set and told my brother about it so he can use for his tablet. Great pens, great price, great value! Comes in a nice black case.
customer_reviews.author: Alf

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous and so practical as well!
customer_reviews.text: This stylus set is so beautiful. The small styli will come in handy for signing the PDFs that I use in my timeshare rental and resale business. The smaller points on the styli were my primary intention when I purchased this set. But upon opening the lovely box I realized I will be able to use the larger soft tips as well. The company was easy to communicate with when I had a question. That’s always a plus. Buy this set—You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Icydog

customer_reviews.title: Good pens for what I am using them for
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my hands and sometimes find working on my iPad painful, especially when doing something that requires me to touch and move things around on the screen a lot. This is a 2 pack set of pens with several different tips and they work great. It was a little complicated for me to understand exactly how to get the tips on but I have a 21 year old son who currently lives at home while going to college so he got me all set up in no time. :) . I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chere M.

customer_reviews.title: It will help you draw on a touch tablet not the best but works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to take my Samsung tab E around with me and draw in public or at school. The pen feels nice in your hand, it makes a good connection with the tablet. I'm getting used to drawing on a smaller screen as I have a huion and primarily use Photoshop when drawing and the mobile apps are not as great. There are two good apps if you have android that work well with this pen they are "PaperDraw" and "Artflow" using any other app the pen lines were not as clean, I knew it was an app problem and not the pen. Hope this helps you.
customer_reviews.author: Paulryanp

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for taking notes on a Samsung Galaxy tablet and highlighting text and both sides of the stylus work great. The cushion side is so much more firm and better than the cheap rubber that comes on basic pen/styluses. Weight feels nice and i like that you can screw the cap on both sides for safe keeping. For the price and what functions you would expect of it, and the fact that you get two pens plus four fine point and 2 cushion replacements I highly recommend this product. Came on time and the packaging is nice too with a company card stating to please reach out to them if any problems which is a nice confidence touch.
customer_reviews.author: Ujwal B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, lower price would be nice
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if they had a pack with two different colors rather than one color and black. I am also not sure why these things are so spendy. I have fingers that touch screens don't like. A stylus really helps. There are two downsides of using a stylus. One is that I have trouble keeping track of it and the other is that they are quite spendy. I don't think the manufacturers can do anything about my inability to keep track of small things but they can do something about the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Works for NINTENDO SWITCH
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Nintendo Switch in preparation for Mario Maker 2 and I tested it out on the Switch Tablet and it works perfectly with it both ends do! I would highly recommend this stylus for those Nintendo Switch users out there looking for one to use. and the Quality of it is Devine.
customer_reviews.author: Angry Customer

customer_reviews.title: Palm Rejection is not good.
customer_reviews.text: The price point on this 2 pack of pens is awesome! They do navigate you around the iPad well. The only problem I experienced was that the palm rejection is horrible. I primarily take notes on my iPad through GoodNotes and it kept eliminating the words I wrote and it was just not good. I invested in a bit more expensive pen, around $40, and that works amazingly to fix that issue and I still don't feel the need to buy the expensive Apple Pencil! I will keep these 2 pens for back ups and to simply scroll around the iPad as the soft tip on this pen comes in handy for that.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn F

customer_reviews.title: Just takes a little gettin used to but great product
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this and my initial reaction is good. The "disk" tips are much more sensitive than then "fiber" tip but with just a little practice, I can see the practicality of both. Haven't used them on my iPad yet but they work great on my iPhone. Got these for my wife and I so we didn't have to touch screens out in public. Great price, very stylish and practical!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product worthy of buying
customer_reviews.text: It is a well designed with a beautifully style and works with both my iOS and Android mobile devices. The cap that protects the disk-pin is a good design which really helps not only protect the disk-pin but carry in the pocket. I like the bigger end when it is used as an eraser, which makes the pen feel like a traditional pencil. The extra pen and parts are great! I did not give it a 5-star rating is because the disk-pin is not accurate enough for engineering drawing. Although the disk is transparent, it does cause obstruction to put the disk-pin to the exact locations often enough. Is there a reason why the disk is a must?
customer_reviews.author: Steven W.

customer_reviews.title: Have to poke too hard.
customer_reviews.text: The soft stylus tip works a little better on my iPad, but kind of hesitantly on my iPhone, unless I poke or push hard, which is annoying. I guess I was hoping for it to work like the iPencil. The fine writing tip doesn’t have quite the precision I hoped for and also requires a heavier hand than I want. Finger still works better. On the plus side, nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a while
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. I use them for my school tablet, but they kind of broke relatively fast. The girl who stole one from me seemed to like it. You’re welcome, Grace.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The day I bought my new iPad, there was another customer taking a training class and he had the new iPad pen and just loved it. He let me try it out and I'm thinking, $100 for this? Why? Well, it's not happening with me. So I got this one instead and even though it was a ton cheaper and has all these changeable tips which I'll never use all of them, there kinda neat to have and I think they do just as much as what I seen the expensive one did. Just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Accurate, Quality Stylus
customer_reviews.text: Love the accuracy for writing text, drawing and playing games! It's the size of a standard pen. The gripper does slide up and down a bit when I'm securing the stylus in my tablet case, but it's not a huge deal. The bubble tip end isn't that cheap rubber material that tears easily, it's much more durable. The disc end does occasionally lose the screen if I move too fast, like when you scroll through pages without actually reading. The screw-on cap is nice, the disc end would definitely break if it weren't protected. Very nice stylus, love that it was a 2-pack!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Perry

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. I’ve tried several others, but this one is the very best.
customer_reviews.text: Used for iPad Pro. Came on time, well boxed, and beautifully displayed. Truly excellent styluses. They work effortlessly. I recommend them highly. Well worth the money. I’ve tried several others, but this one is the very best.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Yobar

customer_reviews.title: Product Quality  on market  Beware
customer_reviews.text: Exactly 4 days after the 30 day window it started falling apart. I have no idea what the warranty on this, probably 30 days! It should have lasted longer than this
customer_reviews.author: debbi h.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the rubber tip stylus
customer_reviews.text: I use the "mesh" end for my coloring book app It's just like using a marker. The rubber tip type stylus drag too much. These are perfect. The plastic disk end works and I could see using that for handwriting, but it's not something I use right now. My only regret is I think I'd like to have purchased the new model which have a bigger grip area, but these really do work great.
customer_reviews.author: mrsklock

customer_reviews.title: It's Good
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed at first. My husband and I are having a difficult time finding the right pen. When I came across this pen it says works on most tablets, ect. Unfortunately, it does not work on a Ugee art tablet. It does work well on the iPads and phones. Plus, school is starting soon so we decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: For a stylus, MEKO really sets the standard!
customer_reviews.text: Straight up, I'm a stylus person & never came across one that really impressed me. Getting a set of these was a real "WoW" moment; The set comes in a sleek package & MEKO is quite generous with replacement tips. In terms of everyday use, they're well designed, extremely durable & the tips last. I enjoyed my first set so much that I bought another! Just a followup, built to last & no issues. Truly, the only other I found remotely close came from the Comptroller of MD.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I Tried It and Liked It - Still Using It Months Later
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve transitioned from pointing/drawing with the finger(s) to the cheap office dual function ink pen/stylus to the Meko Universal Stylus that I’m using as I write this review on my iPad. And the short review is I love it! I’ve been using it for months now and it has held up well, I’m still on the original installed tips. It has a very comfortable feel and weight, and does what I want it to do. I know I could have paid more for a different stylus or pencil, but this one comes with so many tips at such a reasonable price, why should I pay more? Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joe Video

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how good it worked with my iPad mini 2. I don't want to buy the new iPads that are compatible with the apple pencil but wanted to try out the apps like procreate and use the digital notebooks. This stylus works very well and I don't think I will be visiting the Apple store for a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCTIVITY THRU THE ROOF!
customer_reviews.text: This product has made my life and productivity as a veteran investigative journalist and author so much rusher and productive! I continue to say as someone who is disabled by a neurological diseases that make my hands very numb this is the product you use when you’re and I use it to write on my swipe screen keyboard!.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabethan Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Surprised me with the Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: it’s now 2019 (3years after I purchased these) and I STILL love them! They are THE best that I have ever owned and I have ZERO complaints even after all this time. I’m only now editing my review because I’m about to order another set so I can have a gold one too. A little frivolous gift to myself for the holiday season! These were actually better than expected! I really only got them so I can draw better on snapchat but I got it in the mail (early) and started playing with them and was surprised at the quality. I am very happy with this purchase, and they send you a limited year warranty card and screen cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Vbauer

customer_reviews.title: The price is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a couple of these pens because I use them for studying. I took a gamble on this brand and its been an excellent investment. For the price you get much more than the competitors. Also there are two different points. One that has the round plastic disk and another which is a metallic fabric. Both are excellent and work well. I'm glad to have purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Capacitive Touch Style Pen
customer_reviews.text: Found this great product after many reviews of others. Really liked the "extras" they included in the purchase, especially the extra tips. It it also a great design with both disk and nub pen tips built into the same pen. The weight of the pen is balanced and the construction materials are top quality, including the built in grip sleeve. Iv'e been using this for months now on my Kindle Fire Tablet running the Autodesk Sketchbook drawing app and am very pleased with the performance and accuracy. Would purchase these again in a heart beat, but based on use so far, that may be a while. Purchase with confidence !
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Goewey

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 2 years ago and have used them a lot! I love the smoothness of the fiber tips, which never become sticky like rubber tips do. I have not had to replace the tips yet, but extras came with the pens in case I ever need too. Also, more tips can be purchased on amazon, which is not true of all brands. As a side point, my set of 2 arrived in a beautiful box, which makes it an easy gift item. I bought a second set for my parents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It came in a beautiful package, very nicely wrapped. Does exactly what I want. The finer print side I find difficult to use but that's more with user error than product problem. Even though I can see where it should be landing I'm never sure where the exact start spot is going to be so I fond myself writing in cursive or drawing lines in such a way so I don't have to lift the pen. I read the plastic helped you to see what your doing but not so much for me. Regardless though, I love it. It's very sensitive and I'm not having to tap hard for my phone to read it. A very light tap is enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This stylus does not work well on an iPad Pro. If you want to draw with it, my advice is don't. I do not like the flimsy plastic disc on the tip. It is not worth the price and would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stylus. It is so much better than the rubber tipped ones, the tip I use is some kind of metal mesh. It has a plastic disc tip on the other end. I’ve been using them for a couple of years now. The tips last for months and can be replaced. It’s longer than most of the rubber tipped ones, which makes it easier to hold. I keep one with my iPad, one in my purse, and a couple of extras in case I lose one. I’m lost without them.
customer_reviews.author: gadget addict

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stylus!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stylus! Finally found one that works great and will last a long time. Love that it comes with refills on the tips, plus you can buy just the extra tips. The microfiber end is my favorite. I use that most of the time. The disc end takes a little getting used to and I think my screen saver makes it so it doesn't move as smoothly as it should. It still works well though.
customer_reviews.author: Tanyer

customer_reviews.title: Helps large hands to easily use the small iPhone keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have large fingers so working with an iPhone 6 was a real challenge before getting the MEKO Stylus. This product really works! They even include extra tips if you're a little heavy handed at the beginning of using this well made product. It really works great for a reasonable price. I thought it would cost much more.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence H. Yakulis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for writing on an HP touchscreen.
customer_reviews.text: I love the thin tip attachments. They are perfect for writing on my touchscreen hp laptop. The wider tips I'm unsure about since they tend to "skip" and won't draw a clear line. That being said, I really only wanted to be able to write on my laptop and the thin tips help me do exactly that! I use them for school as I am a teacher.
customer_reviews.author: PenGryphon

customer_reviews.title: Great stylus.
customer_reviews.text: I love these pens. I purchased them because they have the disc tips and we’re recommend by an artist on YouTube as an affordable option. I only use them to draw on my iPhone. It does exactly what I need it to and I’m still on my first disc after hours of drawing many different pictures. I’ve attached a basic sample of a drawing where I used only this stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten to use this for super detailed work - but I bought this set to split between my son and I - I play a lot of games on my phone (and write on my phone), and my son has a touchscreen Chromebook. He enjoys it - said it made his artwork a lot easier to do. And I find I can write for longer periods of time without my hand hurting.
customer_reviews.author: W Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my daughters touch screen computer for doing her school work! She 11 and finds it easy to hold and works with accuracy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B. Leisengang

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 for 1 deal for very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This works well with my android tablet which is what I mostly use it for. I like that it came with two styluses and that we can easily exchange the tips once they wear out. The precision tip works very well for when I'm working on detailed tasks on my small screen. The clear plastic at the tip allows me to see exactly where I am applying the motion. This stylus (both the precision tup & regular stylus tip) isn't as responsive on my iphone 6 plus, however, I do have a thick glass screen protector installed, so this might be more of a problem with the protector than the stylus.
customer_reviews.author: FJ

customer_reviews.title: Not for writing notes
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and thought I could use this to take notes. I am impressed with the build quality but not there function. I bought this based on reviews and the pictures people posted showing legible handwriting. I am unable to write legibly with this stylus. I could see basic coloring and painting but not writing. I'll be trying a Bluetooth stylus next. My other disappointment is while trying to return it asked me to pay $7 shipping. I don't remember having that issue in the past with Amazon but for a $15 product I decided to not bother returning. My kids will be able to use it to color on their apps.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Parkinson’s patient approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad who has Parkinson’s. His tremors and lack of mobility have made it more and more challenging to navigate his smartphone. He loves these. The dual ends are nice, depending on what he needs to do. I also tested them out and was impressed by the accuracy. I also like that it comes with so many extra tips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable stylus
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love this stylus. It has weight, so I feel it's durable. My daughter and I both use them to draw on tablets and this is the perfect stylus for that. Kind of weird to use at first, because it's not like using a traditional pen/pencil. But once you get the hang of it, it works great! Having the extra accessories is nice, as well.
customer_reviews.author: KPSAlph

customer_reviews.title: I love love love using these for everything I do on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love love love using these for everything I do on my iPad or iPhone..I gave one to my mother to use when she does her art on her Samsung tablet and she says she will never use her finger again and to this day she hasn't stopped using it.. The refills it comes with definitely help when you use it to much and it's all worn you don't have to worry about going out and getting a new one bc it comes with so many to last a long time. The box it comes in is very nice to. I suggest getting this..you won't regret it I promise!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Dallasta

customer_reviews.title: Great stylus for the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these for myself then after I used it I got one for my sister for a birthday present. I then thought I lost mine and ordered another pack. These are great! They have the just the right weight and they feel great in your hand. I would highly recommend this product. Try it I know you will like it! You get 2 and 2 different tips. I like them both! Thanks so much for giving me a great product for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorna B Estep

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad Pen Quality
customer_reviews.text: This iPad stylus pen is a great value for money and made with great quality. It writes easily on the iPad and good for drawing. It is a great 2 pack with different 4 disks for replacements. It has good grips for writing and drawing. The case helps to protect the pens and for easy carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Ultimalexy

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Thinkpad x1 yoga gen 5
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is thinking of getting this for a Thinkpad x1 yoga gen 5- don’t. It does not write. I needed a replacement pen as the one that comes with the computer dies in 3 hours; however, the computer does not recognize this as a stylus or pen. It is essentially useless for the purpose for which I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: s1c2y9

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use long term
customer_reviews.text: This product is really nice and is a really great deal but in my opinion isn’t idea of you need to take notes or want to write legibly. I wanted to use it to teach remotely so I can write notes for my students but the lack of being able to rest your hand on the screen makes it EXTREMELY difficult to actually use it. Wouldn’t recommend it if you don’t want to write with your hand in the air.
customer_reviews.author: Bria Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC !!! This is a great product. Easy to use, slides well across the screen, very light, and very inexpensive. Our DIL saw this, loved it too and immediately ordered a set. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is I color a lot and it is difficult to get into very small spots with this. Other than that this is a GREAT product 👍⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have a new tablet that I was having trouble using due to calluses on my fingers. Once I figured out to UNscrew the cap, okay I'm a little dense, I was happy. These come setup so there are 4 extra pinpoint ends and 2 extra blunt ends. I have a screen protector on a Lenovo tablet and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Works with Chromebook with screen protector!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this stylus can't be beat. I'm happy to report it works well on my Acer Chromebook, with screen protector installed. Very nice little package, with good construction, and extra tips. The mesh tip doesn't work for me, but the plastic tip does, and since several spares are included the stylus should last a very long time. Great Amazon purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dan the Saxman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to grip and handle. Great look, this would be a nice gift. I was confused at first, I thought the round knob at the tip had to come off, but it doesn’t (I don’t remember what it is called). It works on my daughters school Microsoft chromebook, and our iPhones.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Love fine lining; minor surface marring.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love being able to sketch and see where I'm sketching fine lines. I did notice surface marring on my screen protector from using the disc fine tip, but as long as I have a screen protector on I feel it will be OK. Really happy w the price for 2 & so many tips in 3 sizes. And a screen cloth. That's a deal.
customer_reviews.author: rideNaside

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool! The rounded end isn't as accurate, but the other side is a dream! This is the first stylus I've had that really works. I've had it two weeks and it's relieved the ache in my hand. Very accurate on the flat tip side. I'm giving it another two weeks before I recommend this personally to my family. It comes in a nice box, 2pens, and even extra tips for each stylus. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great stylus for fine print writing
customer_reviews.text: These have worked very well on my iPad Pro. I bought them when I was starting a class so I could take notes and save paper. Most others I had used had a thicker point that made handwriting tougher. I have been very pleased with these so far. They glide very well and it's easy to accurately write in small fine print. I've been using them 3 days/week for about 2 months so far and haven't had to use any of the replacement tips so far. I also don't really use the "eraser" that much. These are a fantastic alternative to the Apple pen which, while more full featured, is way more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great stylus pens!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old daughter so she can use to draw on her phone/tablet. The pens are very easy to use and very sleek. The plastic disc is a little weird but I know it's necessary. It's great because it comes with replaceable tips. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: May Y.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as butter...
customer_reviews.text: I'd been using a cheap stylus for years. Since getting hooked on a pixel coloring app I wanted a nicer stylus (hoping that the movement across the IPad screen would be smoother. Wow, these are great. You get two styluses/styli? and extra tips. These would also make a great gift. People would think you spent more than you did!
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Merrill

customer_reviews.title: WOW! I love thus stylus
customer_reviews.text: This MEKO stylus is the upmost quality instrument that I've owned. The fiber point is far superior to old, cheap rubber points. My screen has no smudges on it like those old, cheap rubber point styluses made. Plus, it's feather light, and it has a metal housing, not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: GaryWW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent--but could use a softer grip...
customer_reviews.text: This stylus works wonders. In my experience, it's accurate, and fairly easy to use. Glides softly against the screen and seems durable as well! My only quarrel is with the "comfort" grip. It's only on one side and not very soft, so I'm only able to use a grip half the time and even then it's not super comfortable. Easy enough to fix though, I simply stretched out a new grip over it. Great product besides that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stylus set because the reviews were so wonderful and I am very happy with it. My Lenovo Flex does not have the Microsoft Ink set up and I wanted to have a stylus for creative projects and also for taking notes. This stylus is a very reasonable price and actually does what it says it will: provides for precision drawing and writing on touch screens. I am so please with the quality for the price! All other stylus's I have used have been garbage compared to this one. It even arrives in an attractive box with refills. WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Mom Cat

product_meta.title: MEKO Universal Stylus,[2 in 1 Precision Series] Disc Stylus Touch Screen Pens for All Capacitive Touch Screens Cell Phones, Tablets, Laptops Bundle with 6 Replacement Tips - (2 Pcs, Black/Black)
feature_bullets: ABOUT THE STYLUS: Length:5.5"(140mm); Pen tube diameter 0.35"(9mm); Disc diameter: 0.27" (6.8mm) including 2mm rubber point ; Fiber tip Diameter:0.24 (6mm); Weight: 24g -- Made from stainless steel and Aluminum, no plastic parts, real pen feeling

PRECISION: The clear disc allows you to see exactly where your mark is being made and gives you the accurate point. Perfect for taking notes and drawing apps - 100% Compatible with all capacities touch screen devices (Apple iPad , iPhone, iPod, Kindle , Tablet, Galaxy& more)
REPLACEABLE TIP FEATURE: Replacing can be done within a second without tool , Extend lifetime of the stylus

PACKAGE INCLUDED -- 2Pcs Stylus; 4 Pcs Replacement Disc Tip;2 Pcs Replacement Fiber Tip. To find extra replacement Disc tips, please search ASIN: B016X4QJWE on Amazon. Replacement Fiber Tip - Please search ASIN:B074HP7WJ5 on Amazon
NOTE: Though the Disc works just like a fine point stylus, the disc stylus is not fine point stylus. If you need a true FINE POINT Stylus, please search Asin: B07LG7DHXL on Amazon.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars9,478 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
